			[1729] tabpanel 'Reviews (3)'
				[1873] strong ''
					StaticText 'Customer Reviews'
				[1884] list ''
					[1885] listitem ''
						StaticText 'This equipment is great!!'
						[1887] LayoutTable ''
							[1888] LayoutTableRow ''
								[1889] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '100%'
						StaticText 'This equipment works beyond expectations and is well worth the cost. The range finder works out to 300 yards. You will not be sorry purchasing these binoculars.'
						[1900] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[1902] strong ''
								StaticText 'Vincent Andrews'
						[1903] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[1905] time ''
								StaticText '4/20/23'
					[1906] listitem ''
						StaticText 'First night tryout- no experience!'
						[1908] LayoutTable ''
							[1909] LayoutTableRow ''
								[1910] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '100%'
						StaticText 'I got this set overnight- right before a snowstorm where it was total blackout.I read all the reviews; I don’t have anything to compare these to other than a Gen 1 monocular I pad $600 for in 1990 (probably) and that was fun- until now!OK- haters are gonna hate but these things are a blast! I live in the forest and I have have very few neighbors. My house has some small solar lights but I can see EVERYTHING I probably will need to see at magnification; and this is where I have my one qualm:I would like to have zero magnification and then be able to zoom. With these you are instantly at some form of magnification and get to zoom in. But clarity is fantastic!I have yet to figure out what the 7 modes of IR will reveal but the color in low light is cool as heck and you will see well with these in closer quarters.For the money- I think you could say I’m happy and excited to use these for the purposes I need them for and expand later if I need to.Hope this helps!'
						[1921] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[1923] strong ''
								StaticText 'Shayla Antrim'
						[1924] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[1926] time ''
								StaticText '4/20/23'
					[1927] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Night vision with range finder'
						StaticText 'This day and night vison range finder is a good tool that gives the vermin hunting air gunner all he needs to successfully hit the quarry. The need for a screwdriver to access the battery compartment is a bit of a nuisance. The picture quality both day and night is good and more than sufficient for air gun shooters.'
						[1932] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[1934] strong ''
								StaticText 'ian stuart wolstencroft'
						[1935] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[1937] time ''
								StaticText '4/20/23'
